title: The critical temperature for the BCS equation at weak coupling
abstract: For the BCS equation with local two-body interaction λV(x), we give a rigorous analysis of the asymptotic behavior of the critical temperature as γ»0. We derive necessary and sufficient conditions on V(x) for the existence of a nontrivial solution for all values of λ>0.

keywords: Gap equation, critical temperature, Birman-Schwinger kernel, degenerate symbols
